insights.populationGrowth: Declining -1.2% due to extreme remoteness and harsh climate driving outmigration.
insights.educationLevel: Lower education 68% literacy due to geographic isolation and traditional lifestyle.

insights.temperature: Alpine climate, very cold winters (-10°C), cool summers (15°C). Highest elevations in Bhutan.
insights.precipitation: Moderate 800mm with winter snow. Snow-dependent water systems.
insights.seasonality: Long harsh winter (October-April), brief summer growing season.
insights.extremeEvents: Severe snowstorms, avalanches, glacial lake outburst floods (GLOF), extreme cold.

recentEvents.impact: Glacial lake monitoring increased, evacuation planning

preparedness.reliefCapacity: Very Low - Extreme remoteness, helicopter access only
